projects.name: Diabetes Prediction
projects.description: Developed and deployed a predictive analytics model for early diabetes detection by leveraging machine learning techniques and comprehensive datasets. Conducted rigorous feature engineering, model evaluation, and hyperparameter tuning to ensure accuracy and reliability.

projects.name: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.description: Built a computer program to predict if someone might get heart disease early on. I used information like age, medical history, and lifestyle habits to make these predictions. Then, I tested and improved the program to make sure it gives accurate results.
